content: Can someone help me set up lean to work in Atom?
Is there a Lean extension for Atom? I'm not aware of one, and without one it will be very difficult to work with Lean in Atom.
Wait nevermind, I just misunderstood the instructions. Thanks for the help though

Here's a video showing what working in Lean is supposed to look like:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=b59fpAJ8Mfs
As you can see, the special "infoview" window giving real-time feedback is crucial to the process, and won't exist in YourFavouriteIDE (only in a couple of supported ones)
And if you want to write an extension for one more IDE it might make sense to wait for Lean 4.
They were going to release it a couple of months ago, so we can hope that they'll release it this year.
